alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 19 at 2:53AM MST until February 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and south central and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind speeds will increase throughout the day. Peak gusts may range between 45 and 65 mph, with the highest gusts on higher terrain including the Sierra, Spring Mountains, and the Mojave Desert north of Interstate 15.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts
